message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm really interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $90.

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. However, I've already done some research and I know that similar products are selling for upwards of $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $100. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product.

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob. However, I've already invested some time and effort into this product, and I'm not willing to go below $110. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer it to you for $102.50.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, but I'm still a bit above $100. I'm willing to pay $98 for the product.
